DataElement.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Stage Oral Candidiasis Opportunistic Infection Grouping Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the participant has a history of opportunistic infection and/or thrush.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Kaposi Sarcoma Stage Oral Candidiasis Opportunistic Infection Grouping
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a history of OI (opportunistic infection) and/or thrush and the staging (the extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body) of Kaposi Sarcoma (a malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin however, it may also occur internally.  It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).:The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

Concepts.definition: A malignant neoplasm characterized by a vascular proliferation which usually contains blunt endothelial cells. Erythrocyte extravasation and hemosiderin deposition are frequently present. The most frequent site of involvement is the skin; however it may also occur internally. It generally develops in people with compromised immune systems including those with acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS).
The extent of a cancer in the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: Infection of the mucous membranes of the mouth by a fungus of the genus CANDIDA. (Dorland, 27th ed):An infection caused by an organism which becomes pathogenic under certain conditions, e.g., during immunosuppression.:Grouping; a system for classifying things into groups; the activity of putting things together in groups.

Concepts.definition: Infection of the mucosal lining of the mouth with the fungus Candida albicans.
Infection caused by an organism that is capable of causing disease in immunocompromised patients only (e.g. HIV-positive or transplanted patients).--2004
A system for classifying things into groups or the activity of putting things together in groups.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
